open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha
open.description:
We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha, Western Cape.
Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work.
All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.
